description: ===> NEW FEATURE: YOU CAN NOW SELECT A LOCAL AUDIO FILE TO USE FOR DETONATION! <===  iDetonate is the first REAL remote sound effect detonator that allows you to trigger your phone to make all kinds of crazy and wacky sounds directly from the iDetonate.com website.    There's nothing better than you and a group of friends watching as someone tries to figure out why the book shelf keeps saying "Help Me".  It's simple and easy to use!  1.  Create an account at http://www.iDetonate.com or touch the "Create an Account" button in the iDetonate app.  2.  Enter your username and password.  3.  Touch the Detonate tab and arm your phone.  4.  Once armed go to http://www.iDetonate.com and click on the "Detonate" button.  There you will be able to choose a sound and detonate it on your phone.  Possible prank scenarios:  - Hide your phone in the kitchen cupboard and detonate the "Frog" sound.  - Put your phone on top of a friends computer under their desk then detonate the "Modem" sound.  Watch your mark wonder why their computer is dialing out.  The possibilities are endless.  ***COMING SOON - Within Weeks!!!*** I am adding some really cool features and sounds that will make iDetonate even more versatile, customizable and fun to use.  Please leave me feedback at iDetonate.com and let me know what new features you want as well as any issues you find or complaints you have.
